short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear browsing data on browser reload.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes:
✓ Browsing history
✓ Download history
✓ Cookies and other site data
✓ Cached images and files
✓ Passwords and other sign-in data
✓ Autofill form data
✓ Hosted app data

Simply select the data types you want removed in the extension pop-up, and the data will be deleted the next time Chrome is closed and re-opened.

Source code is available at the link provided.
